snippet: The TD James Moody Democracy of Jazz Festival, named for a celebrated Newark musician, will feature acts including George Benson, the Manhattan Transfer, Jon Faddis and David Sanborn.
abstract: TD James Moody Democracy of Jazz Festival, named for a celebrated Newark musician, will feature more than 15 events, many of them free; festival is scheduled to take place in October at the New Jersey Performing Arts Center and other places in Newark (Metropolitan/New Jersey).
lead_paragraph: The TD James Moody Democracy of Jazz Festival, named for a celebrated Newark musician, will feature acts including George Benson, the Manhattan Transfer, Jon Faddis and David Sanborn.

headline.seo: TD James Moody Democracy of Jazz Festival Taps Newark’s Heritage
headline.main: A Week of Jazz and Remembrance
headline.print_headline: A Week of Jazz and Remembrance
